name: Thomas McGuinness
text: Good efficient ordering app. Legitimately fast food. Not gonna get delayed there. And the pizza with it's toppings are really good

name: Pooja Rathod
text: Great pizza. Awesome test. So yummy ü§§. So you can build your own pizza it has regular medium size than they cook in front of us. They put our order number with the pizza so no confusion l, no mistake. They also have some variety of salads, ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Sacco
text: This place is really good for a quick bite to eat, but also great for groups. I've been here tons of times and their food is always consistently excellent. They actually gave us a free pizza because ours got folded over in the oven and it ‚Ä¶More

name: Bryan Martins
text: Went on the recommendation of a friend. Was very pleased with a selection of toppings and the reasonable price. I really enjoyed the flavors and appreciate that you can see everything made right in front of you. For a flat fee you can have ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Mannisto
text: Pizza was great! Thumbs up as my 2 year old says haha! The place was clean and staff were very nice. Tried to help in every way possible which was great. Will be back again. Plus price for the food it is an awesome deal!!!

name: Greg Altavilla
text: Very helpful service.  Good food quick. Good Quality.

name: David San Antonio
text: Blaze pizza puts a creative twist on pizza! Chipotle style serving where you add the ingredients that you want. The ingredients are fresh and taste amazing! The staff is always nice and the restaurant has plenty of seating that is always very clean.

name: Dhruv Patel
text: I really liked the the concept ‚ÄúBuild your own Pizza‚Äù just like we order a sandwich in Subway. They make the pizza from the scratch in front of you with fresh ingredients. The pizzas are cooked in Bricks oven (Natural way). The pizza was great in taste and the crust was too good. Vegetarian/Vegan friendly place.

name: Jennifer Denmead
text: My stepson's favorite place to eat when we are in Nashua! He loves it because he has a dairy allergy and they have a vegan cheese which means he can eat pizza when we're out where he wouldn't be able to otherwise.

name: Kevin Whelan
text: Today was our first time trying Blaze, staff was super friendly and helpful explaining the process as this is a kind of like a Chipotle style ordering for your pizza. Food was ready in less than 5 minutes and it was delicious! Toppings and everything tasted fresh and can't wait to have the leftovers later as a snack!

name: Samuel Vibin
text: Was my first time at blaze and they helped me customize my own pizza by explaining patiently. Awesome

name: Ben Horton
text: Great staff, also if you haven't been to blaze it slaps! You should try it, get a build your own and let your pizza dreams come true

name: Jennifer Silverman
text: We were hungry and this place happen to just be nearby.  It was busy so we gave it a go! You design your own pizza down an assembly line. It was downright tasty! Quick  & Polite service.. now I'm wishing I had one closee to home!

name: DPSFSU
text: Very good pizza. At their busy times/days, the line to order can be very long but during the slower periods, you can get your order in quick. Many many great toppings and also a few different crust options. Prices are fair and the employees working there are very friendly. FYI: try the DESSERTS! Sooooo good!!

name: Nate Wooding
text: I've been to a few franchises of Blaze, and it's so consistently good. Props to the company, they know how to hire. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam
text: Blaze pizza is pretty delicious if you eat it once in a while.

name: nital patel
text: Love this place. 2 high rise pizzas and 1 gluten free came to about $30. We love that you can see everything made right in front of you!

name: Donna Binette
text: Small menu but good and quick.

name: Siannon Shea
text: Currently devouring this deliciousness. Highly recommend, but really only this location. It's not packed with obnoxious and loud college kids like the ones in Cambridge and Boston. They also made my pizza right this time unlike the others. So point is, this place is bombbbbb but you should come to the Nashua location onlyüëå

name: Bill Drevojan
text: Great FAST pizza made exactly the way you want it!

name: Carol Hallowell
text: Love the the crust on blaze pizza-thin and chewy. Prices are great and ingredients are always fresh. Half pizza and a salad makes a great meal! Staff at Nashua location is fantastic.

name: Anshul Karri
text:
1. Ambience good.
2. Location clean.
3. Staff : friendly and professional ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicole Chase
text: Happened upon this place and it was such a happy accident.  LOVED the high rise cheese pizza!  Probably one of the best I've had since Expresso's in Medford closed :( ‚Ä¶More

name: Quadrillion01
text: Got the 1/2 pizza and salad combo. The pizza crust was very chewey with something like sandpaper grit on the bottom. Not too generous with the toppings and the salad was mostly lettuce, but it was okay for less than $9.

name: Kr Pr
text: Best thin crust pizza outside of NYC! Love their build your own. For less than $10 you can put as many toppings you want on your pizza. Whenever we are near a Blaze Pizza we always make sure to stop in. Extremely thin crust pizza with a great crunch!

name: Lisa Wilkinson
text: Rude customer service. Left without ordering

name: Lorin DeBellis
text: I'd been to one of their other locations in Boston and I found the same speed and quality here. For $7 you get a fast, individual portioned pizza. Beats fast food in the mall food court.

name: Manoj Gupta
text: Amazing and fresh pizza. The best thing is you have lots of options to choose as toppings. The crisp and hot pizza is mouth watering. Place is priced pretty reasonably. Definitely worth the visit. Direct access from parking lot and from inside the Pheasant Lane mall.

name: John Krupa
text: Love coming to this Blaze! Pizzas always come out hot and delicious. The staff that works at this location are very nice. Also, the pizzas are a great value here. Highly recommend this Blaze Pizza location.

name: Shawna Allen
text: Great place. Pizza was delicious. When we went it was super busy. Staff was very friendly and smiling despite the crazyness.

name: Nathaniel White
text: Pizza was good and the lemonade was tasty next time though I would ask them to leave it in just a touch longer for a crispier crust.

name: Jen Brown
text: Great pizza, excellent and friendly service, reasonable prices. I love how friendly and easy to talk to their employees are - they help you out with the pizza building process and are really nice and genuinely seem to like their jobs. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Alyssa Schrow
text: Wicked tasty pies here. Love the crust perfect amount of char that delivers great flavor without being burnt. The build your own toppings have always been very fresh. You should come here.

name: Katrina V
text: Solid pizza, fast service, good prices. Plus they heated more Smores pie in the oven which was awesome.

name: Abdul Calderon
text: Incredible staff! It‚Äôs not often that you go to a fast food establishment and receive exceptional service. Every single person working was so nice and friendly. Amazing job to the hiring manager. Tori and staff were great. Food was amazing!

name: Gregory Fedor
text: They refused to sell any large Pizzas in the store, claiming they only did so through their online app. The individual said this information and were extremely rude and unprofessional. I refused to eat their after this horrible customer ‚Ä¶More

name: Shashank B
text: I have been to this place more than few times, I liked this place, quick service helpful staff and tasty food. The idea of making the food in front of us and pretty much everything related to it you can choose how it should be starting from ‚Ä¶More

name: chloe longstreet
text: Yummy pizza that I can eat on keto. It made me happy and my daughter happy too.

name: R Houseman
text: Good pizza only wish they offered more vegetables for pizza toppings.  Salads are good as well.

name: Bobby
text: Best pizza ever.

name: Soleivy Silverio
text: The pizza the here is always great

name: Sebastian Mineo
text: Build your own 10" pizza for <$10, as many toppings as you want! Can't beat it. Thin crust, fresh veggies, very tasty sauce. Other prices for only cheese and 1 and 2 topping pies as well as specialty pizzas. Ask for more what ever and they'll gladly add at no extra charge.

name: Ramakrishnan Krishnan
text: Hands down Best Pizza in Town. Staff are so accommodating with special needs. They made an amazing pizza for my family. Its too Bad they don‚Äôt accept tips. Reasonable cost , great pizza and amazing people.

name: Amanda DeMarco
text: Blaze pizza is always great - custom pizzas at a great price

name: Vathay Yaing
text: Really simple, fast and friendly service, delicious pizza, very affordable.  Our server was incredibly helpful giving us the run down of how the process goes.

name: Audrey Riedle
text: We had our son's 5th birthday here today and it was an amazing experience.  Dennis the manager is awesome and extremely accommodating.  We highly recommend this location for birthday parties.  We all loved the pizza and you can't beat the price!

name: Elizabeth H.
text: Staff is excellent. They manage to stay positive and accommodating even though they're so busy with so many customers. I got a 2 topping pizza with grilled chicken, onions, and mozzarella. Grilled chicken was not grilled fresh like I ‚Ä¶More

name: hyperactiverobot
text: Pizza is very delicious and very thin.

name: Yashika Anand
text: Love love love it! So fresh , crunchy and guilt free pizza. Best part is they use red onions not white onions üòä. Service was so quick and staff if very efficient. I can have these hot and crunchy pizzas anytime.

name: Alyssa Nault
text: Hubby recommended we grab pizza here the other day bc he knew they had vegan options- we got our pizza with mushrooms, red peppers, garlic, spinach (?), vegan cheese, and bbq sauce- sooooo good!  üòã Definitely recommend!

name: Jameson Gagne
text: Blaze has awesome customer service, but above all, the pizza is delicious. You can add your own toppings and make it just the way you like it. Inexpensive and quick.

name: Joylanda Williams
text: Great pizza! The veggie pizza is delicious! Love the customer service. This place is great for kids as well. My son loves that he gets his own personal pizza.

name: Brian Pierce
text: love the selection. pizza is definitely best fresh, wouldn't highly recommend take out.

name: Linda Riedle
text: My daughter had her 5yr old son's birthday party there.  We had a designated section for pizza party. Great food and great times.

name: Peggy Stephens-North
text: Very attentive staff and liked the fact that there is a salad option. Would have liked more fresh veggies like broccoli, sprouts, etc. The atmosphere is industrial.

name: Robert Shumaker
text: Went there on black friday and even with a huge crowd they were crushing it!  No lapse in quality or excessive wait times.

name: Eric Fredette
text: Love this place. The speed and customability similar to Subway, but with so much flavor and a perfect thin crust (other options for crust are available including a keito(sp?) crust)

name: Meghan Brown
text: For the price and quality of the pizza this is one of those places you can't go wrong if you are looking for a quick bite. The pizzas are cooked in a flame oven. Pizzas can also be made to order. It is an amazing place. However word of ‚Ä¶More

name: Bob Boyd
text: The pizza was very good and fresh. Fun experience. the employees were even better very polite and welcoming. We'll be there again soon

name: Charles Dunn
text: Best way to think of this place is as Subway but with pizza.  Great food,  well prepared, and great service.  The restaurant was clean, and the folks there provided top notch,  friendly service. ‚Ä¶More

name: Venetta Rodrigez
text: We try to go here regularly. We already found our favorite waitress; she always greets us when we come in and makes you feel like you're the only person in the room while she's taking your order. The food is great, the staff is great, what's not to like?

name: Ross Douglas
text: Great food, really friendly staff...the guy moving pizzas in and out of the oven is a master!

name: Gabriela Lugo
text: I love the Nashua restaurant, super close to my house and the spectacular food.  But they have an employee named Jason who thinks he is the one who pays you for the pizza and wants to serve you as he wants, making the wishes of the consumer ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Tierney
text: This may be fast food, but the fast is in the preparation and has no bearing on the quality. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brett Shaver
text: Blaze is like the Chipotle of pizza where you build your own. Even though it's a chain pizza place, it's actually quite good. I'd say it's on par or better than a local non chain pizza shop.

name: Green Skeleton
text: The staff there were super nice and helpful. The pizza was wonderful. Would definitely come back

text: Great pizza, quick, friendly service. I'd come back again.

text: I did an online order, I got there right on time and the cashier rudely said that there's no online orders. She went and checked, and saw the labels printed. She said they just printed, so i would have to wait. I said ok, but I placed my ‚Ä¶More

name: Ganna Lytvynenko Amorim
text: PHENOMENAL pizza. Cooks fast. You can put whatever you want on it. They have vegan toppings galore including CHEESE AND CHORIZO. GASP. How the times are changing. Can't wait for everyone to hop onboard the vegan train. Thank you Blaze pizza for being so progressive!

name: varun kaushik
text: The pizza is made very quickly. This is a great place to come for quick meals, also it's very healthy. The staff is nice and you can put as many veggies and meat on as you want with a build your own.

name: C T
text: unbelievably fast service, very friendly while I waited for them to box up my pizzas which were coming out hot as soon as I walked in. I tried their keto pizza and for only 3 carbs a slice and 110 calories it was DELICIOUS. it's my new fan favorite and this place is top on my list and i will be returning soon!

name: JJ WW
text:
Upon coming in I was immediately welcomed back by Jill.  Jason took my order.
Down the line, the two seemed to have a system with the people in line.  Making my order Jill was even nice and offered my kiddo some pepperoni .
Nice coming in and having smiles everytime.

name: Jason Xavier
text: Build your own pizza with unlimited toppings for one price.  Neat idea.  Overall pretty good, only issue is that I haven't figured out the right combination of cheeses/spices to get the pizza itself just right.

name: Donna Magiera
text: Great place to hold a school benefit had a great meal

name: Satya M

text: Great pizza at a great price. Nice staff that go over the top with their service. They have a menu, but pizzas are fully customizable at the same price! They want your pizza to come out 100% correct.

name: Fire Fly
text: Best pizza in the whole world..

name: emma wilson
text: Amazing Service! Jason was serving us and he was so nice and made sure we we're okay with how the pizzas looked before moving on. All the staff are amazing. Great prices also!

name: Michael Putnam
text: Amazing. I have never seen a concept like this before. You pick what you want and they make it for you on the spot. Cooked in a fired stone oven. There was an excellent amount of ingredients like grilled chicken, roasted garlic cloves, ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyreke Colon
text: Fav Brick Oven Style pizza place. Used to go to the ones in New York and Florida near where i lived...didnt know there was one not to far from Lowell. Definitely recommend getting 2 pizzas one is never enough...especially if you do the half pizza and a salad combo lol.

text: Excellent service, fantastic food, and an all-around great place to experience!

name: Jennifer Barrett

name: Mike Trujillo
text: Worst customer service ever. Which is a shame because the pizza is actually really good. But hope you don't have to speak to anyone about your order because they are rude as hell and will just hang up on you for no reason like this guy Alex did to me today.

name: ml1116
text: A great setup and nice kids working there.

name: Trevor Wood
text: This is like a Subway for pizza. Fun to make, comes out absolutely delicious, and it's super affordable. Great deal.

name: Christina Levitan
text: I love the idea behind this pizza place. It's like a chipotle but for pizza! You pick your toppings as you walk along the counter and they cook it right there on the spot! Pizza was great and filling! Many healthy choices as well. Awesome drink variety as well! Love the lemonades! Can't wait to come back and try some more!

text: Great place for quick, customized pizza.

name: Ash W
text: The Blaze Pizza in Nashua, NH. I will not be returning to ever again. The staff, particularly Dennis was very rude. She was rude to me during check out and when she gave me my pizza. I was very disappointed with the experience.

name: Kyle Coulter
text: Excellent customer service, and high quality fast food pizza. Won't be the best pizza you've ever had, but may be a weekly staple depending on location convenience. Great prices (roughly the price of a frozen pizza). Plenty of options to build your pizza.
